    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://fire.eun.org/xsd/lre/lre.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>

            <catalog>sdt.sulinet.hu</catalog>
            <entry>75a697a6-7daa-4b0d-8802-53028d14e610</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu-HU">Bevezetés a genetikába</string>
            <string language="en-US">Introduction To Genetics</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Einleitung In Eine Genetik</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Introduction À la Génétique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Introdução Ao Genetics</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Introduzione Alla Genetica</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εισαγωγή στη γενετική</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Introducción A la Genética</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu-HU</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu-HU">Bevezetés a genetikába, genetikai alapfogalmak: gén - allél, genotípus, homozigóta - heterozigóta; fenotípus, a génműködés kifejeződése, az enzimműködés és a fehérjeszintézis</string>
            <string language="en-US">Introduction to Genetics, Basic Terms of Genetics: Gene - Allele, Genotype, Homozygote - Heterozygote; Phenotype, Expression of Genetic Functioning, the Enzyme Functioning and Protein Synthesis</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">biológia</string>
            <string language="en-US">biology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">genetika</string>
            <string language="en-US">genetics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">öröklődés</string>
            <string language="en-US">inheritance</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Einleitung in eine Genetik, grundlegende 
Bezeichnungen von Genetik: Gen - Allel, Genotypus, Homozygote - 
Heterozygote; Phänotypus, Ausdruck des genetischen Arbeitens, 
des das Enzym-Arbeitens und der Protein-Synthese</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Introduction à la génétique, limites de base de 
la génétique : Gène - Allèle, Génotype, Homozygote - 
Heterozygote ; Phénotype, expression du fonctionnement 
génétique, du fonctionnement des enzymes et de la synthèse de 
protéine</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Introdução ao genetics, termos básicos dos 
genetics: Gene - Allele, Genotype, Homozygote - Heterozygote; 
Phenotype, expressão de funcionar genetic, de funcionar do 
enzyme e de síntese da proteína</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Introduzione alla genetica, termini di base della 
genetica: Gene - Allele, Genotipo, Homozygote - Heterozygote; 
Fenotipo, espressione di funzionamento genetico, di 
funzionamento degli enzimi e della sintesi della proteina</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εισαγωγή στη γενετική, βασικοί όροι της γενετικής: 
Γονίδιο - αλληλόμορφο γονίδιο, γενότυπος, ομοζυγώτης - 
ετεροζυγώτης  Φαινότυπος, έκφραση της γενετικής 
λειτουργίας, της ενζυμικής λειτουργίας και της πρωτεϊνικής 
σύνθεσης</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Introducción a la genética, términos básicos de
genéticas: Gene - Allele, Genotipo, Homozygote - Heterozygote; 
Phenotype, expresión del funcionamiento genético, del 
funcionamiento de la enzima y de la síntesis de la proteína</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Biologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Genetik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Erbschaft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">biologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">la génétique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">transmission</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">biologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">genetics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">inheritance</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">biologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">la genetica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">eredità</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γενετική</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κληρονομιά</string>

          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">genética</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">herencia</string>
          </keyword>
